question:
The steering committee on fintech had submitted its recommendations to the finance ministry. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The committee recommends the consideration of virtual banking system.
  2. Debt financing in India uses peer-to-peer lending model.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The committee recommends the exploration of virtual banking system option in India. The committee recommend consideration of cost and other benefits associated with the system and its applicability in India context. This will reduce the need for opening new bank branches and will enable greater delivery of a range of retail banking services. Statement 2 is correct: Debt financing in India makes use of peer-to-peer lending model. The committee recommended the application of a marketplace model to improve this platform. P2P model involves matching of lenders and borrowers. A large portion of such loans are unsecured. These lendings have lesser liquidity than stock market counterparts.
